docs.title: ⚔️ AOT:R Regiment Wiki
docs.text:
Welcome to the official wiki for the Ding Ding Ding Regiment in AOT:R on Roblox.

This space is built for individuals who want to rise to the top through their own effort. We’re not here to hold your hand or babysit you. The road to mastery is tough, but that’s the point. This wiki exists to provide the knowledge to help you improve and reach your peak.

We are a community of self driven players, each pushing the limits of what we can achieve. Whether you’re a seasoned player or just starting out, if you’re willing to put in the work, you're welcome to hop aboard.

docs.title: 📌 What This Wiki Covers
docs.text:
• 🛡️ Regiment For those who demand more from themselves. Set your own standards, prove your skills and challenge others. Entry requirements are relatively easy, if you fall short you're shit, get grinding.

  • 🎯 Junior Regiment* The Junior Regiment** is a buffer for the main regiment — where newcomers can train, learn, and prepare for the the main regiment. No entry barriers, just a willingness to put in the effort. We all start somewhere.

  • 📖 Techniques & Information (coming soon) Learn techniques, skills, and information to improve your gameplay. Everything here is aimed at those ready to make the most of it.

docs.title: 💬 Join the Regiment Discord
docs.text:
This is where you’ll connect with like-minded, self-driven players. If you’re ready to take your game to the next level, the community is here for support, challenges, and accountability.

👉 Click here to join our Discord

The only way to the top is through hard work and self drive. If you can't even do that much, piss off.

docs.title: ⚔️ AOT:R Regiment
docs.text: Welcome to the Regiment page! This is where you'll find details about both the Main Regiment and the Junior Regiment. Whether you’re starting your journey or ready to join the elite, you’ll find your place here.

docs.title: 🛡️ Main Regiment
docs.text:
The Main Regiment is for players who are ready to push their limits and compete at the highest level. This regiment is for those who want to prove their mastery and be a part of the elite.

Main Regiment Requirements: - Complete a Sub 2:30 Outskirts Run under the following mission modifiers: - No Skills enabled. - No Talents enabled. - Additional Restrictions: - No Hoarding (don’t hide in corners—grind it out). - No Heavenly Restriction abuse (keep it fair and competitive). - Mobile Players: Your time requirement is Sub 3:00, with the same restrictions applied. - Clip Submission: Applicants must submit a full clip of the run with evidence of the above mission modifiers and restrictions being followed at the end of the clip.

Joining the Main Regiment isn’t about being the best by default; it’s about consistently challenging yourself and improving your skills. If you don’t meet the requirements yet, the Junior Regiment is here to help you get there.

docs.title: 🎯 Junior Regiment
docs.text:
The Junior Regiment is a subsidiary and buffer for players who are still learning or not yet ready for the Main Regiment. This is the place to train, hone your skills, and build the foundation for moving up.

There are no strict entry requirements here—anyone can join. It’s the perfect place to grow, learn, and prepare for the tougher challenges of the Main Regiment.

While this regiment doesn’t have the same entry barriers, we encourage players to take the time to improve and push their limits. Once you’re ready, the Main Regiment will be waiting for you.

docs.title: 📖 Techniques & Information (coming soon)
docs.text: Stay tuned for in-depth guides on techniques, strategies, and essential information to improve your gameplay. We aim to provide everything you need to master the game.

docs.title: 💬 Join the Regiment Discord
docs.text:
For more support, discussions, and opportunities to connect with like-minded players, join our Discord community. It’s where you’ll find challenges, teammates, and advice.

👉 Join the Discord

The journey to the top is all about hard work and improvement. Stay focused, keep grinding, and you’ll get there.
